Hypertable::PageArena

Hypertable::PageArena< CharT, PageAllocT > Class Template Reference

A simple/fast allocator to avoid individual deletes/frees Good for usage patterns that just: load, use and free the entire thing repeatedly. More...

#include <CharArena.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename CharT = char, class PageAllocT = DefaultPageAllocator>
class Hypertable::PageArena< CharT, PageAllocT >

A simple/fast allocator to avoid individual deletes/frees Good for usage patterns that just: load, use and free the entire thing repeatedly.
